Character.name: João
Character.description: João is a brave and adventurous boy who loves to explore the forest and carve wooden figures.

Location.name: Vilage
Location.description: A quiet village nestled among verdant mountains, where João and Maria, two inseparable siblings, lived.

Location.name: Floresta
Location.description: The vast and mysterious forest surrounding the village, where João explored nature's secrets.

Location.name: Floresta Mágica
Location.description: A hidden part of the Floresta where João and Maria found the ancient book and embarked on their imaginary adventures.

Location.name: Casa
Location.description: The humble abode where João and Maria lived.

Event.name: The discovery of the old book
Event.description: João and Maria found an old book in the forest, which inspired them to create their own adventures.
effects: João and Maria started creating their own adventures.
Their adventures became legendary in the village.

Event.name: João and Maria started creating their own adventures
Event.description: Inspired by the stories in the old book, João and Maria started creating their own adventures.

Event.name: João and Maria’s adventures became legendary in the village
Event.description: The adventures of João and Maria became legendary in the village, inspiring other children to use their imagination and explore the world with creativity and courage.
